categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Goji" was the nickname of a clone trooper pilot who served in the Republic Navy during the Clone Wars. At the Battle of Malastare, he flew a Y-wing starfighter and was responsible for deploying the electro-proton bomb, an experimental weapon that secured the Republic's victory.
Goji had standard Phase I clone pilot armor that was customized to depict a green creature with yellow eyes.
Goji's name is a tribute to the Japanese name Gojira (ゴジラ), known in English as Godzilla. His armor is also a reference to the famous character.
